details: Reentered after three weeks in orbit
First of twenty missions flown under the CRS1 contract
First Dragon capsule to be reused
Second Dragon capsule to be reused
Destroyed on impact after F9 launch failure
Destroyed in a test anomaly at LZ-1 on April 20, 2019
Capsule used to qualify Dragon 2's environmental control and life support systems.
Rumored to be used for Inflight Abort Test after DM-1
Currently in construction for use in DM-2
In construction for use in first mission in contract under the CCtCap contract
